edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.users

Class UserDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.users.UserDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDao

    public class UserDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDao
    DAO implementation class for User Entity bean; Provides access methods for User entity
    Author:
    Pramod R. Khare, Swapnil Gupta

      • getUserByIdWithDocumentsForEvaluation

        public User getUserByIdWithDocumentsForEvaluation(java.lang.Long userId)
        Get User by given userId along with all documents for evaluation for all members where he is registered in EVALUATOR role
        Specified by:
        getUserByIdWithDocumentsForEvaluation in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        userId - - user id
        Returns:
        User object with given user-id along with documents to be evaluated by this user - (this has documents from all members where this user is registered as EVALUATOR)

      • getUserByIdWithAllocatedEvaluatorsMappings

        public User getUserByIdWithAllocatedEvaluatorsMappings(java.lang.Long userId)
        Get user by its user-id along with his allocated evaluators mappings; i.e. All evaluators who will be grading this user's submissions - UserToReviewerMapping contains details about which document, for which member and by which reviewer user.
        Specified by:
        getUserByIdWithAllocatedEvaluatorsMappings in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        userId - - user id
        Returns:
        - User object if there exists such user with given user-id else null

      • getUserByIdWithSubmittersToEvaluateMappings

        Specified by:
        getUserByIdWithSubmittersToEvaluateMappings in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        userId - - user id
        Returns:
        - User object if there exists such user with given user-id else null
